title: Congo peat: The 'lungs of humanity' which are under threat
description: Carbon-rich peatlands are under threat from development, posing a risk for future climate change.

title: France gears up for new battle: Macron v Mélenchon
description: The French president could lose his majority in the National Assembly because of a left-green alliance.

title: 'Why we rent out our colourful homes for photoshoots'
description: The growing need for aesthetically pleasing spaces is causing people to give their homes a makeover.

title: Cockpit footage of Nato jet encounter with Russian reconnaissance plane
description: Nato footage shows extremely close encounters with Russian military aircraft in the skies of Europe.

title: Russia defiant and a rock band reflects on war - round-up
description: Foreign minister says Russia is "unashamed" and an award-winning band reflects on filming in Kyiv.

title: Ukraine war: EU leaders back immediate candidate status for Kyiv
description: Ukraine belongs to the European family, the leaders of Germany, France, Italy and Romania say in Kyiv.

title: What we can expect in the next few days
description: The European heatwave is bringing hot weather to parts of the UK, where temperatures are expected to peak on Friday. Chris Fawkes has the details.

title: Ukraine War: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov fact-checked
description: Russia's foreign minister has been speaking to the BBC about the war in Ukraine.

title: Quiz of the week: What replaced McDonald's in Russia?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on over the past seven days?

title: Gazprom: Russian gas boss says 'our product, our rules' in supply row
description: It comes after energy firms in Germany, Italy and Austria report big falls in Russian gas supply.

title: Kevin Spacey granted bail over sexual assault charges
description: The Oscar-winning actor "strenuously denies" allegations he sexually assaulted three men, a court hears.

title: Apple battery row: Millions of iPhone users could get payouts in legal action
description: The tech giant is accused of secretly slowing down the performance of older models.

title: Ukraine war: Ex-Russia captain Igor Denisov says 'maybe they'll kill me' for opposing invasion
description: Former Russia captain Igor Denisov becomes one of the highest-profile athletes still living in the country to speak out against the war in Ukraine.

title: Ukraine war: Moroccan's death sentence being ignored, sister says
description: Brahim Saaudun and two Britons were captured by Russian forces while fighting for Ukraine.

title: UK interest rates raised to 1.25% by Bank of England
description: The Bank of England increases rates to 1.25% as it tries to stem the pace of rising prices.

title: Lord Geidt quits over ministerial code 'affront'
description: PM's ex-ethics adviser says he was put in “odious” position over a plan to risk breaking ministerial code.

title: Rwanda asylum plan: European court intervention was wrong, says Raab
description: The justice secretary says the grounding of the flight strengthens the case for reforming human rights laws.

title: Renting: No-fault evictions to be banned in England
description: The Renters Reform Bill will also end blanket bans on benefit claimants or families with children.

title: Forgotten WW2 love letters found in wardrobe at empty home
description: The letters date from 1942 to 1946 and were exchanged between a young woman and an RAF commander.

title: Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira: Suspect leads police to human remains
description: UK journalist Dom Phillips and indigenous expert Bruno Pereira went missing in a remote area on 5 June.

title: Beyoncé announces her first album in six years, Renaissance
description: The star's seventh album will be called Renaissance, and fans only have to wait one month to hear it.

title: 'Dom was one of the best - quiet but curious'
description: Author Andrew Downie pays tribute to Dom Phillips, who is feared dead after going missing in Brazil.

title: Hospital waiting list at 6.5 million in England
description: One in 20 has been waiting - for routine care such as knee and hip surgery - for more than a year.

title: Premier League fixtures: Man City away to West Ham, Liverpool at Fulham, Forest at Newcastle
description: Champions Manchester City travel to West Ham on the opening weekend of the 2022-23 Premier League season.

title: How hot is it where you are?
description: Compare the temperature in your area to other locations in the UK and around the world.

title: Eight million Australians urged to turn off lights
description: Australia's energy minister has urged households to use less electricity in the face of a power crisis.

title: Matthew Mott: Australia's Meg Lanning on what England can expect from new one-day coach
description: Who is new England white-ball coach Matthew Mott, and how can he keep Eoin Morgan's teams at the top of world cricket?

title: England v Belgium: Sarina Wiegman says upcoming friendlies are a chance to find starting Euros line-up
description: England’s friendly with Belgium is a chance to perfect their style of play and find a preferred starting XI just weeks before the Euros start, says manager Sarina Wiegman.

title: 'The Russians said beatings were my re-education'
description: Ukrainian citizens have told the BBC they were punched and electrocuted before being allowed to leave Mariupol.

title: Plague: Ancient teeth reveal where Black Death began, researchers say
description: Researchers say they finally know the origin of the plague that killed tens of millions in the 1300s.

title: By-election: Is Tory marginal Wakefield ready to go red again?
description: Attack ads, voter apathy and the red wall - Iain Watson hits the by-election campaign trail in Yorkshire.

title: Love Island: How Demi Jones helped Hollyoaks actress spot thyroid cancer signs
description: Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips discovered lumps on her neck after watching Demi Jones' videos.

title: Bitcoin: Will El Salvador's big crypto gamble pay off?
description: The cryptocurrency crash is hurting many investors, including one country that has bet big on Bitcoin.

title: Scraps of stale bread are keeping Afghans alive
description: Falling incomes and soaring prices under the Taliban have left many struggling to feed themselves.

title: Anglo-Saxon burial ground unearthed at HS2 site in Buckinghamshire
description: Nearly 140 graves, a skeleton with a spear point embedded in it, jewellery and weapons are among the finds.
